message.content: {"id": "16822", "title": "Bug 16822 - Search results not removed when cu is moved", "description": "Build 200205211.", "OB": "Move X.java to 'P/src2'. Observed Behavior: The search result is still displayed in the search view. Attempting to double-click on the search result opens a 'Search Error' dialog, which states: An error occurred while creating a Java element. Reason: X.java does not exist.", "EB": "", "SR": "Steps to reproduce: 1. Create project P with 2 source folders 'src1' and 'src2'. 2. Create a compilation unit (cu) X.java under 'P/src1'. public class X {} 3. Search for the declaration of X. 4. Move X.java to 'P/src2'. Expected Behavior: The search result should be automatically removed from the search view when the compilation unit is moved. Attempting to double-click on the search result should open the corresponding file without any error dialogs being displayed."}
